title: SpeedRunners
notes: Steam shows Very Positive (95% of 22,548). Metacritic metascore 84; blended high‑80s.
raw_comment: 2D platform racing. 4 local players. 16 with mod: https://www.moddb.com/mods/speedrunners-multiplayer-plus 🎮 16 PS4/PS5. SteamInput on. 🎮 16 XBox. SteamInput on. ⌨ 1 on keyoard 🖥️ Shared screen.
